name: Nuclear Reactor Simulator
description:
A fun and easy Nuclear Reactor simulator Note: this is not for educational purposes and is only for fun so its not 100% accurate!

How to play

1: turn on water pumps then pull rods out and make the reactor heat reach 550 to 700 and not 900 or more cuz it will explode

2: add turbine speed to at least 1000

3: turn turbine oil to 100 then turn gear on after you get steam pressure open the turbine valve then wait for turbine to spin and generate power

press esc button to exit

that's it!

say in comment if you see a bug and i will try to see if i can fix it or no
